segments.text: I feel a bit sorry watching this kitchen unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so engrossed in drying that plate, missing everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is creating such a wasteful mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's just pouring out, and no one's there to stop it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that shaky stool, risking a fall for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me think of how kids sometimes get hurt doing silly things.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, hand outstretched for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the mom won't even know until it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems serene, like a different world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the family could enjoy their day without these mishaps.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light, but it highlights the neglect inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a poignant reminder of everyday oversights.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor things, caught in their own little bubble of unawareness.
